SELECT p.id, p.name, MAX(t.create_time) create_time, COUNT(t.`id`) total, SUM( CASE WHEN t.state = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS unused FROM tb_product p LEFT JOIN tb_product_card t ON t.product_id = p.id
AND p.seller_id = #{sellerId} AND p.type = 3
AND p.name like concat('%',#{productName} ,'%')
GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY p.id asc, create_time asc LIMIT #{start}, #{count}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT p.id, p.name, t.create_time, COUNT(t.`id`) total, SUM( CASE WHEN t.state = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS unused FROM tb_product p LEFT JOIN tb_product_card t ON t.product_id = p.id
AND p.seller_id = #{sellerId} AND p.type = 3
AND p.name like concat('%',#{productName} ,'%')
GROUP BY p.id ) bak

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT p.product_id, p.sku_num, MAX(t.create_time) create_time, COUNT(t.id) total, SUM( CASE WHEN t.state = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS unused FROM tb_product_sku p LEFT JOIN tb_product_card t ON t.product_id = p.product_id AND t.`sku_num` = p.`sku_num`
AND p.product_id = #{productId} and p.storehouse_id != 0
GROUP BY p.product_id, p.sku_num ) bak

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT s.`statistics_date`, COALESCE(SUM(s.checked_num), 0) checked_num FROM tb_product_card_statistics s WHERE s.`seller_id` = #{sellerId} AND LEFT(s.`statistics_date`, 7) = #{month} GROUP BY s.`statistics_date`) t
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_product p, tb_product_card_statistics s WHERE p.`id` = s.`product_id` AND s.`seller_id` = #{sellerId} AND s.`statistics_date` = #{day}

SELECT p.`id`, p.`name`, s.`sold_num`, s.`checked_num`, s.`statistics_date` FROM tb_product p, tb_product_card_statistics s WHERE p.`id` = s.`product_id` AND s.`seller_id` = #{sellerId} AND s.`statistics_date` = #{day} LIMIT #{start}, #{count}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_product p, tb_product_card c
AND c.product_id = p.id AND c.seller_id = #{sellerId} and c.product_id = #{productId} and c.state = 3 and DATE_FORMAT(c.`checked_time`,'%Y-%m') = #{month}
